org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.quantize

Class QuantizedRatingPredictor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.grouplens.lenskit.basic.AbstractRatingPredictor
      • org.grouplens.lenskit.transform.quantize.QuantizedRatingPredictor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RatingPredictor

    public class QuantizedRatingPredictor
extends AbstractRatingPredictor
implements RatingPredictor
    A rating predictor wrapper that quantizes predictions.

        @Inject
public QuantizedRatingPredictor(@PrimaryScorer
                               ItemScorer scorer,
                               @Nullable@BaselineScorer
                               ItemScorer baseline,
                               Quantizer q)
        Construct a new quantized predictor.
        Parameters:
        scorer - The item scorer to use.
        baseline - A baseline scorer to fall back to.
        q - The quantizer.

    • Method Detail

      • predict

        public void predict(long user,
           @Nonnull
           MutableSparseVector scores)
        Description copied from interface: RatingPredictor
        Predict for items in a vector. The key domain of the provided vector is the items whose predictions are requested, and the predict method sets the values for each item to its predict (or unsets it, if no prediction can be provided). The previous values are discarded.
        Specified by:
        predict in interface RatingPredictor
        Parameters:
        user - The user ID.
        scores - The prediction output vector. Its key domain is the items to score.
